data.name: Wolfriders A Sniper Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Wolfriders is a short game about the adventures of a sniper. Read the comic book chapters and play the short levels. You'll feel like you are inside the comic book.



Break your oath, gather Wolfriders and lead the resistance to victory. You are the only one to turn the tide in the war between the free world and the E.M.P.I.R.E.

  • Special levels for sniper and assault gameplay
  • A gripping story
  • Comic book style storytelling
  • Lots of guns and armors
  • 26 playable levels

Resistance needs you! Join them in this immersive story!

data.short_description: Wolfriders is a sniper game with a comic book style storytelling. Read the comic book chapters and play the short sniper and assault levels to unveil the immersive story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8, 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bits processor and OS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Game includes sniper shooting, headshots, dead bodies and blood.
